analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Kusalaṁ bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nabāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: kusalam bāhiram dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na bāhiraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Abyākataṁ upādā dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: abyākatam upādā dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na aupādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Kusalaṁ noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …
analyzed: kusalam no upādā dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pannarasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pannarasa.
analyzed: tīṇi saṅkhitta hetuyā pannarasa adhipatiyā pannarasa pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pannarasa

original: Abyākataṁ upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: abyākatam upādinnam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Abyākataṁ upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: abyākatam upādinnam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Abyākataṁ upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naupādinno ca naakusalo naupādinno ca
analyzed: abyākatam upādinnam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na aupādinno ca na akusalaḥ na aupādinno ca
